item.title: The purpose of this blog
item.description: Why I start this blog? ðŸ”— Got married this year and began thinking about finance and leaving something for my kids Learn about finance and share my knowledge There’s a lot of information out there, there are people trying to sell you a course but I don’t have a course to sell to you, I will share my knowledge for free Achieving financial freedom isn’t about being rich. It’s a necessity.
